title: INSANELY EPIC BATTLE - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
description:
Napoleon Total War Gameplay - This battle has such an AMAZING ending!  This is one of the closest battles I have ever seen in Napoleon Total War. It's a 2v2 online battle.  Prussia and France are battling Great Britain and Austria.  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
